name: The Backrooms: Project Luminosity
description:
(WIP)

The Backrooms Project: Luminosity is a backrooms game made in Ue5.

Lumen is a lighting system in Unreal Engine that has gotten better over time and is still getting better as we speak! 

Get ready, These aren't the same halls you've ran through, these halls are dark with no light coming from the usual light sources. Instead the lights come from the backrooms randomly generated lights which seem to appear out of thin air with no known source, Trust HIM.

This game is MAINLY dark.

Game is currently NOT being developed as an other project is getting worked on and the modeler has stuff to do in life. Most likely will start development when the other projects demo is finished or the modeler has time to model for the game.

Credits:

Main Dev

Music

If you want to help, just post it in the discussion board.
